name: Amnesty of the Exiled
description:
You were chosen by Mah, the God of Gods, and sent to the Island Between the Realms to unbanish the previously exiled deities who may deserve a second chance in another realm.

Your task is to judge the fallen god Dolotek, and uncover the mystery behind the events that happened before your arrival in order to pass a good judgement.

🌼

The game is in first-person person and consists in exploring the environment and collecting pieces of information that will tell you more about the story and the world. Depending on which information you find, different options will be available during dialogue. It lasts about 45 to 60 minutes, with about half of that time being spent on reading.

Controls

  • WASD to move.
  • E to interact.
  • Left Click to pick dialogue options.
  • Tab or J for journal.
  • Shift to run.
  • Spacebar to jump.

Made in one semester by a group of six international students for the Game World Design class in the Msc in Games at the IT University of Copenhagen, May 2022.

  • Christine Hegedüs | Programmer (Dialogue) & Technical Artist
  • Claudia Castelo | Programmer (Interactions) & Audio Engineer
  • Elfi Kühndorf | Level Designer (Second Level) & Technical Artist
  • João Diogo Nunes | Narrative Designer & Audio Designer
  • Mahmoud Bagheri Moghaddam | Level Designer (First Level) & Technical Artist
  • Wiktoria Kos | Project Management & Programmer (UI)

Beware that this is a student project and there are some bugs and other flaws.
